DOC.brief_summary: The study design examine safety , tolerability , activity combination microbubbles ( perflutren lipid microsphere [ DefinityÂ® ] ) continuous monitor 2 MHz transcranial Doppler ultrasound ( TCD ) adjunctive therapy tissue plasminogen activator ( tPA ) treatment subject acute ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Microbubble-Enhanced Clotbust Treatment Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Measurable focal neurological deficit ( National Institutes Health Stroke Scale [ NIHSS ] score > 4 point ) tPA eligible Occlusion middle cerebral artery Right leave cardiac shunt Uncontrolled hypertension Absent temporal window
